name: ml-template-basic
description: This is the basic template for Microlattice.js

scripts.build: ml parse:js && ml build:js && ml build:init && ml build:bin && ml burn ./out/mt7687_iot_sdk_xip.bin
scripts.installEnv: ml install:sdk && ml install:gcc && ml install:jerry && ml install:ml

author: iamblue
